resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107147</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107147</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087152</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Understanding Evolution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verstehende Entwicklung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évolution d'arrangement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Evolução Compreensiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sviluppo Capente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση της εξέλιξης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Evolución Que entiende</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Your one-stop source for learning and teaching about evolution. This website includes information about how evolution works, how evolution impacts our lives, evidence for evolution, and the history of evolutionary thought. There's also an entire Understanding Evolution for Teachers sub-site, which includes lesson plans, a conceptual framework, and discussion of classroom situations that may arise when teaching evolution.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ihre one-stop Quelle für das Lernen und das 
Unterrichten über Entwicklung. Diese Web site schließt 
Informationen über ein, wie Entwicklung arbeitet, wie Entwicklung 
unsere Lebensdauern, Beweis für Entwicklung und die Geschichte des 
Entwicklungsgedankens auswirkt. Es gibt auch eine gesamte 
verstehende Entwicklung für Lehrer Vor-Site, die Lektionpläne, einen
Begriffsrahmen und Diskussion über Klassenzimmersituationen 
einschließt, die entstehen können, wenn sie Entwicklung 
unterrichten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Votre source one-stop pour se renseigner et 
enseigner sur l'évolution. Ce site Web inclut des informations 
sur la façon dont l'évolution fonctionne, comment l'évolution 
effectue nos vies, l'évidence pour l'évolution, et l'histoire de la 
pensée évolutionnaire. Il y a également une évolution 
entière d'Arrangement pour le secondaire-site de professeurs, qui 
inclut des plans de leçon, un cadre conceptuel, et la discussion des 
situations de salle de classe qui peuvent surgir en enseignant 
l'évolution.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sua fonte one-stop para aprender e ensinar sobre a
evolução. Este Web site inclui a informação sobre como a 
evolução trabalha, como a evolução impacta nossas vidas, 
evidência para a evolução, e o history do pensamento 
evolucionário. Há também uma evolução compreensiva inteira 
para o secundário-local dos professores, que inclui plantas da 
lição, uma estrutura conceptual, e a discussão das situações da 
sala de aula que podem se levantar ao ensinar a evolução.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La vostra sorgente one-stop per imparare e 
l'istruzione circa lo sviluppo. Questo Web site include le 
informazioni su come lo sviluppo funziona, come lo sviluppo ha effetto
sulle nostre vite, sulla prova per sviluppo e sulla storia di pensiero
evolutivo. Ci è egualmente un intero sviluppo capente per il 
secondario-luogo degli insegnanti, che include i programmi di lezione,
una struttura concettuale e la discussione sulle situazioni dell'aula 
che possono presentare quando insegna lo sviluppo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μιας στάσης πηγή σας για την εκμάθηση και τη 
διδασκαλία για την εξέλιξη. Αυτός ο ιστοχώρος περιλαμβάνει 
τις πληροφορίες για το πώς η εξέλιξη λειτουργεί, πώς η εξέλιξη 
επηρεάζει τις ζωές μας, τα στοιχεία για την εξέλιξη, και την 
ιστορία της εξελικτικής σκέψης. Εκεί επίσης μια ολόκληρη 
εξέλιξη κατανόησης για την υπο--περιοχή δασκάλων, η οποία 
περιλαμβάνει τα σχέδια μαθήματος, ένα εννοιολογικό πλαίσιο, και 
τη συζήτηση των καταστάσεων τάξεων που μπορούν να προκύψουν κατά
το διδασκαλία της εξέλιξης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Su fuente one-stop para aprender y enseñar sobre 
la evolución. Este Web site incluye la información sobre cómo
la evolución trabaja, cómo la evolución afecta nuestras vidas, la 
evidencia para la evolución, y la historia del pensamiento evolutivo.
Hay también una evolución que entiende entera para el 
secundario-sitio de los profesores, que incluye planes de la lección,
un marco conceptual, y la discusión de las situaciones de la sala de 
clase que pueden presentarse al enseñar la evolución.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087152</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107147</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/understanding-evolution</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
